title: Forgot Password
subtitle: Enter your email address to reset your password
success_message: Password reset link sent! Please check your email.
error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
reset_link_sent: Password reset link has been sent to your email address.
reset_link_sent_to: Password reset link has been sent to
check_email_and_click: Please check your email and click the link to reset your password.
reset_email_failed: Password reset email could not be sent.
